about_the_game:
Combat system utilizing official Unity assets

.
✧ This tool takes official Unity assets for 3D games that have been approved for redistribution and customizes them for use in VR
✧ As such, it has basic melee weapons, enemies, effects, stages, gimmicks, etc.
✧ You can modify the terrain of the stages by utilizing Unity's ProBuilder tool
✧ You can connect and configure your development PC and VR headset to check the operation on the Unity editor without having to build the game

Implement measures to prevent VR sickness

.
✧ VR sickness countermeasure is implemented by narrowing the field of view when moving or changing the viewpoint with the controller.
✧ General VR sickness countermeasures include using a warp to move, but we have adopted a method that narrows the field of view, taking into account the fact that this is an action game.
✧ This function also utilizes official redistributable assets from Unity.

Combat with monsters and robots

.
✧ This kit includes both monster and robot enemies, each with their own set of hit points and attack power
✧ Robotic enemies, like the player, are equipped with melee weapons and can guard against our attacks or prevent robotic attacks

✧ The player's weapon must be swung at a certain speed to trigger an attack
✧ This addresses the problem that tends to occur when creating VR games, which is that it is easy to clear the game by swinging the weapon in small increments.



The source code is expected to be made available at the time of release.

name: VR Action Game Kit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Widows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus PC or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The VR Action Game Kit is the open source game development kit with melee weapons and damage systems necessary for creating action games in VR. You can purchase a sample game of the kit here. New recruits, can you survive?
